What are you doing, if I may ask? <span style="color:#669999">Sister Naomi</span>: It's my job to clean the confessionary, it was assigned to me by <span style="color:#07d7fc">Mother Superior</span>. Should I keep going? <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Oh, yes of course, no problem. I just asked out of curiosity and... you know, now my job is to supervise, so it's useful for me to know what your tasks are, sister. <span style="color:#669999">Sister Naomi</span>: Very well, if you'll excuse me... I need to get to it. <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Father Martín</span> will come to confess us one of these days, and I'd like him to find an inmaculate confessionary. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Of course, <span style="color:#669999">Naomi</span>. By the way, have you had breakfast? All the sisters are in the dining room and you, poor creature, are here cleaning since the crack of dawn. <span style="color:#669999">Sister Naomi</span>: I haven't, sister <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>. <span style="color:#07d7fc">Mother Superior</span> wants me to do this task first thing in the morning and, when I finally finish, there's barely any bread left, so I just wait for midday... -she said dejectedly <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: I'll never understand some of her rules... Anyways, I don't want to bother you and make you lose more time, sister. Have a good morning. While I was walking back, I thought in her full, soft lips, they way they danced slowly while she spoke made me shiver in excitement; I wanted to see them do dirty and degrading things, I wanted to see them put to proper use instead of saying boring and repetitive prayers... She seemed grateful, but she still didn't seem to trust me completely. Perhaps I'd need to do this again tomorrow. Either that or I wasn't powerful enough yet. [[Go back|⇒ Main hallway]] <<elseif $NumberOfTimesNaomiHasBeenFed >= 4 and $DemonPower <= 9>> <center><img src="images/Day 5/Naomi/bandeja desayuno.jpg"/></center> I gave some food to <span style="color:#669999">Sister Naomi</span>. She seemed to trust me, but I needed more Power in order to corrupt her. <<elseif $NumberOfTimesNaomiHasBeenFed >= 4 and $DemonPower >= 10 and $NaomiEvent1 == 0>> As I walked towards the confessionary with the tray of food in my hands I noticed that <span style="color:#669999">Naomi</span>, unlike the rest of the days, was not dusting with the same enthusiasm. She looked worried, and she moved the duster in a desultory fashion. I approached her and left the tray by her side. <span style="color:#669999">Sister Naomi</span>: Ah, it's you, sister <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>. Thanks for the food... Sorry I didn't greet you, I've been troubled by my thoughts lately. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: You don't have to apologize, everybody gets distracted sometimes. Would you like to talk about it? <span style="color:#669999">Sister Naomi</span>: I don't know if I should... It's a confession I have to make to <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Father Martín</span>, but it's so embarassing! -she pouted her lips adorably. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: I see. Then it's something <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Father Martín</span> couldn't empathize with, right? -I grabbed her hand and sat next to her. <span style="color:#669999">Sister Naomi</span>: Maybe. I don't know how to explain without him thinking horrible things about me. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: I have an idea. Let's go into the confessionary, and I'll pretend I'm <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Father Martín</span>. That way you can practice the best way to tell him, what do you think? <span style="color:#669999">Sister Naomi</span>: That's a good idea, sister $name. I'll feel better if I practice. [[Get in|Naomi Event 1]] <<elseif $NumberOfTimesNaomiHasBeenFed <= 8 and $NaomiEvent1 == 1>><span style="color:#669999">Sister Naomi</span> thanks you for the food, and confesses her lewd thoughts to you while you masturbate on the other side of the confessionary. I needed to keep bringing her food to make her mine. <center><img src="images/Day 5/GraceAitana/confessionary masturbating.jpg"/></center> [[Go back|⇒ Main hallway]] <<elseif $NumberOfTimesNaomiHasBeenFed >= 9 and $NaomiEvent1 == 1 and $DemonPower <= 29>><span style="color:#669999">Sister Naomi</span> thanks you for the food, and confesses her lewd thoughts to you while you hear her masturbate on the other side of the confessionary. You've corrupted <span style="color:#669999">SISTER NAOMI</span>. From now on, she'll help you with your chores.'' [[⇒ Go back|⇒ Main hallway]] <<set $HasCompletelyConfessedNaomi to 1>> <</if>> <<set $HasGivenNoemiFoodToday to 1>><<set $InvFood to 0>><<set $NumberOfTimesNaomiHasBeenFed += 1>> Once we were on opposite sides of the confessionary, she knelt and started speaking in a trembling voice. <span style="color:#669999">Sister Naomi</span>: For a few weeks now I've been taking care of a pretty plant I found in our garden, so sometimes I go over to check on it when the sun goes down, to make sure it's growing properly. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: How pious of you <span style="color:#669999">Naomi</span>, to take care of God's creation thus. You have a generous heart. Continue, please. <span style="color:#669999">Sister Naomi</span>: Okay... she sighed- yesterday I went to check on it and, before I came back in, I heard some giggles nearby. There, in front of everyone, was <span style="color:#07d7fc">Mother Superior</span> and <span style="color:green">Helen</span>. <span style="color:#07d7fc">Mother Superior</span>: Good day, sisters. I hope you have had a good night and God accompanies you on this day. The reason for this metting is simple: as you might know, I've been feeling quite //delicate// these past few days, and it's become evident I need my rest if I hope to recover. That is why, in my absence <span style="color:green">Sister Helen</span> will be the one in charge of making sure this holy place runs without a hitch, is that clear? Don't give her more work than you would give me, because I really don't feel like getting out of bed to explain that I don't need ANYBODY bothering me. The sisters looked among themselves, somewhat confused and slightly worried. <span style="color:#07d7fc">Mother Superior</span> continued. <span style="color:#07d7fc">Mother Superior</span>: I'm glad everything is clear, now I'm going to my room. Go back to your tasks and do not bother me. While I was returning to my room, <span style="color:#07d7fc">Mother Superior</span> blocked my path, a frown on her face. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Good day, <span style="color:#07d7fc">Mother Superior</span>, is there something I can help you with? <span style="color:#07d7fc">Mother Superior</span>: Yes, <span style="color:#ce5cc8">Sister $name</span> -she took a paper out of her pocket- this is a list of tasks that <span style="color:green">Helen</span> and I will not be able to do, because she will be the new supervisor and I will be resting. They are now your responsibility, make sure to execute them perfectly. Without giving me time to respond, she turned her back on me and proceeded to her room. I opened the faucet to fill my watering can and set out to tend to the convent's garden. Lately, the sisters had ignored it, and some of the plants were looking wilted and dry. I was surprised when, as I walked completely absorbed in my thoughts, a person burst out of the shrubbery, soaked and covered in mud and leaves. He stumbled, attempting to escape me clumsily, and fell face-first on the ground without even making it a few feet. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Who's there? If you don't answer me right now I'll scream for the other sisters! -I threatened the mysterious individual. <span style="color:#fc6c85">???</span>: No, please! I'm sorry, I'm not a bad person, I'm not trying to do any harm... I'm sorry. A young boy, perhaps slightly shorter than me, covered his face in shame. He didn't look very old, for he was either clean shaven or too young to have grown a beard, which didn't make him look very masculine at all. <center><img src="images/Day 5/Passive/David/profile.jpg"/></center> <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>> Are you some kind of pervert? How did you get in here? <span style="color:#fc6c85">???</span>: I'm not a pervert -he said showing his face with a look of annoyance- there's a hole in your back fence... I snuck in through there, but not to spy on you or any such thing! Or, well... maybe I did, but I'm not a pervert! It's just... it's hard to explain. I raised an eyebrow quizzically and examined him more closely. He was, without a doubt, the least threatening boy I'd ever seen, he actually looked rather sweet and delicate. I felt a deep sense of empathy towards his apparent tenderness. As I continued to observe him, I noticed a number of bruises on his arms and legs. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Then explain. I'd like to know what you're doing among our plants. [[What's your name, boy?]] <<set $DavidEvent0 to 1>> <<set $Energy -= 1>>Taking advantage of the fact the garden was empty, I set out with the //intention// of watering the plants. I looked side to side while I held the watering can, making sure nobody was poking their nose out the windows, trying to get some juicy gossip. I started whistling while I carefully looked for <span style="color:#fc6c85">David</span>. Soon I heard his timid voice. <span style="color:#fc6c85">David</span>: Sister? -he said nervously. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: It's me. There's nobody around, you can come out. He came out and I took him to a place free from prying eyes. I opened the bag I had brought with me and gave it to him. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: This is what I've been able to obtain up to now. I hope it all fits. He smiled from ear to ear and went to hug me. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: I'll never forget this, Sister... <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Call me <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>. Come on, there's no time to lose. We'll say you're a student from the school who's interested in joining the convent and you're coming to visit, understood? <span style="color:#fc6c85">David</span>: Understood, Sister <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>. But... if they realize who I am from my voice? <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: We can think about that later. For now, just keep your mouth shut. Having said this, he finished putting on everything I'd brought him, and, honestly, it looked great! <center><img src="images/Day 5/Passive/David/schoolgirl pose.jpg"/></center> I was grateful to be able to help him in any way I could, his enthusiasm and innocence was a glimmer of light in the pit of darkness and sin that the convent had become in <span style="color:green">Helen's</span> hands. <span style="color:#fc6c85">David</span>: Sister... I thought this might look good on me, maybe this way I'll look less... myself -he said, looking at his feet and presenting a wig he'd brought with him. //[[I think you look beautiful just the way you are, and you don't need something so artificial to cover up your natural talents|NO wig]] [[What a great idea! I don't think it will cover up your inner self, rather it will make your natural beauty stand out|Wig]]// <<set $Energy -= 1>> <<set $DavidEvent1 to 1>><center><img src="images/Day 5/Places/Showers.jpg"/></center> <<if $HasShowered == 0>>[[⦿ Take a shower]]<<elseif $HasShowered == 1>><<linkreplace "⦿ Take a shower" t8n>> I've had enough shower for today.<</linkreplace>><</if>> [[⇒ Go back |⇒ Bathrooms (P)]]<<if $RemodelConventFacilities == 0 >><center><center><img src="images/Day 5/Places/rooms.jpg"/></center></center><<elseif $RemodelConventFacilities == 1 >><center><img src="images/Day 5/Places/New rooms.jpg"/></center><</if>> <<set $RandomNumber to random(1,2)>><<if $RandomNumber == 1>> You didn't find anything here.<</if>><<if $RandomNumber == 2>>YOU FIND SOME ROPES<<set $InvRope to 1>><<set $InvNumberOfRopes += 1>><</if>> <<if $RandomNumber == 2>>YOU FIND SOME CHAINS<<set $InvChains to 1>><<set $InvNumberOfChains += 1>><</if>> <<if $RandomNumber == 2>>YOU FIND SOME WOOD<<set $InvWood to 1>><<set $InvNumberOfWoods += 1>><</if>> <<if $DavidEvent0 == 1>><<if $InvLingerie == 0>>Looking through the rooms, you find some apparently abandoned lingerie. -0.png"/></center> I'd never felt so great. Or maybe, just maybe, [[you want some more valuable help?|• Valuable help (P)]]// [[Go back|⇒ Your room (P)]] <<if $HasBecomePure == 1 and $BookReveal == 0>>/*Esto es cuando hablas con la Voz si has escogido la ruta pura*/<span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Rosary, I need your advice... I know you and I are nothing alike, and that your job is to make my soul corrupt as you've been telling me all this time. But now that I know for certain that I have no real friends left among this place, you're the only one who I can talk to right now. ... <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Rosary, please... Don't ignore me. I'm having enough already being at rock bottom here. I'm just so desperate! ... He wasn't responding at all. Tears started falling from my eyes as I sobbed and begged for someone to listen to me as I was feeling like the loneliest soul in the world. For one moment it occurred to me that if the Rosary wasn't responding maybe that meant he had already completed his task and this piece of wood was but an empty husk. I grabbed it with my right hand and tried to pull it to take it off, but like that one last time, it didn't seem to want to come off. I was pulling with all my energies, but it wasn't working. Nevertheless it didn't seem to want to electroshock me like before, which I thought was strange to the point of madness. I laughed between tears thinking I was probably dammed for eternity, but then for a moment I felt the wooden crucifix throbbing in my hand. I laughed again even harder knowing that I was probably losing my mind already, but again, the pulsations appeared, and this time they were so strong and clear I knew (or I wanted to believe) that it wasn't my imagination. In a blink of an eye, the rosary started bleeding in my hand. I got scared and tried to clean it off, but it didn't work, it just kept bleeding and bleeding. As the last thing I could do I took off my habit to prevent it from being stained since dry blood was almost impossible to get off, but I started freaking out as my chest, belly and legs were cover in a dark, almost black viscous liquid. I just remained there, sitting naked in the privacy of my room waiting for the Rosary to stop discharging all the blood, but as time passed by, I became aware that this discharge was taking a clearer tone. At first it went from red to black, then it started "bleeding" gray, then white, and a few minutes later it was bright and sparkly. Now, my naked skin was covered in all these golden rivers that washed away all the darkness that had covered it before. I began feeling relief and it felt as though my anguish took wings, flying away. You just made <span style="color:green">Helen's</span> work easier and let her corrupt this place. And now she owns all of them, and she owns you too. I can't be here anymore, I need to get out. She closed the door behind me so nobody would notice she was packing her stuff. I felt terribly ashamed since it was my fault she had to leave. I sat at her bed trying to keep calm and convince her to stay. Obviously she didn't even want to look at me. I had really grown to appreciate <span style="color:#a82855">Silvia</span> and her will to walk a virtuous path, and although I used to think I could maybe be like her it was clear that I wasn't as strong as she was. I wasn't made to lead, I was made to serve. [[It's over...]]<<elseif $MotherSuperiorFuneral == 1 and $HasBecomePure == 1 and $SilviaFinal == 0>>I quickly came in when she answered from the other side of the door. I can see you're very serious, I wouldn't dare to doubt you. I hesitated for a moment, but at last I figured although I wouldn't like to involve her in such a dangerous matter, she had been the only sister in the convent that had proved to be a true friend. She was the only one at this point trying to follow the righteous path by keeping herself as pure as she could, and also helping me do the same. Somehow, I felt bad because I realized I only came to her when I needed help, but on the other hand, I was glad because by neglecting her before, I avoided her falling in the hands of <span style="color:green">Helen</span> and <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Father</span>. Now that I was a new and better person I could protect her and be her support as she had been to me before when I needed cover. Knowing I wasn't as lonely as I thought soothe my soul even more. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: There are dark, evil forces trying to take over our convent, <span style="color:#a82855">Silvia</span>. <span style="color:#07d7fc">Mother's</span> death was no coincidence and if we don't do anything, we're going to be absorbed by them and we're going to be enslaved for eternity to serve the purposes of the Demon of Lust. <span style="color:#a82855">Silvia</span>: Oh, thank God... He's the one to blame for all this and <span style="color:green">Helen</span> is by his side. I've found a book that can help us revert all the damage they have done and free us from their hellish influence, but it's not going to be easy... In fact, we're dealing with very powerful forces and it could be extremely dangerous. <span style="color:#a82855">Silvia</span> held my hand between hers and comforted me with a warm hug. All my emotional armor fell down and tears started running through my face. She dried them and kissed my forehead. <span style="color:#a82855">Silvia</span>: Don't worry, <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>. I will help you. I will do anything it takes to save our home and our sisters, including you. You know? Before you came in I was thinking of running away. I couldn't take anymore how this place had changed so fast. I can hear voices trying to get inside my head and screaming at me to make me surrender to temptation and join those dark forces you were talking about. But knowing that someone else has their eyes open, and that that someone is you, I feel like there's a trace of hope that can guide us to the light. I will stand by your side, <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>, and I thank you for bringing faith back into me when I was about to lose it. We hugged again and I noticed how our heartbeats were synchronized. Now that I was sure I wasn't all by myself I felt perfectly confident that I wans't going to fail the titanic task the Lord had given to me. <<set $SilviaFinal to 1>> [[⇒ Go back|⇒ Silvia room (P)]]<<else>>She greeted me and invited me to come inside. <span style="color:#a82855">Silvia</span>: Oh, welcome Sister <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>. I decided not to press her, for I knew <span style="color:#bbf230">Sister María</span> had a good heart and wouldn't let us be hungry if she could help it. I was taking a break from my usual work -she said as she turned down her gaze again, with no interest in me- What brings you here? Perhaps you may also be searching for a place to be //on your own//? Her question surprised me. In fact, I had no idea what she meant. I decided not to show my ignorance, but to stay silent. I nodded my head and left. [[⇒ Go back|Chapel (P)]] I thought to myself that at this time the chapel would be devoid of people and I'd have some time to talk to our Lord and beg him to relieve me, but when I got there, I found <span style="color:#ff9999">Sister Grace</span> and <span style="color:#ffff00">Sister Aitana</span> sitting on the altar, with a cigarette in their hands, chatting and gossiping about trivialities. Since I was a bit shocked, I decided to go to the back and take a knee to start praying and minding my own business. Nevertheless, they interrupted me. <span style="color:#ff9999">Sister Grace</span>: Hey you! Aren’t you the sister that was locked with <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Father Martín</span> in <span style="color:#07d7fc">Mother Superior's</span> office? <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: I don’t know what you’re talking about -I tried to sound convincing and closed my eyes to avoid them. <span style="color:#ffff00">Sister Aitana</span>: Oh, my… What a whore! Silence filled the air as I realised the implication of his comment. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: <span style="color:#fc6c85">David</span>, my sweet boy, I'm so sorry. I wish there was something I could do. <span style="color:#fc6c85">David</span>: Being as nice to me as you have been is good enough, Sis. I'll figure it out, I don't think I should go back with my parents after this anyway. If our relationship was strained before... I know a place I can stay, at least for now. I don't need your charity, but your company is certainly nice. He smiled, a tear forming in his eye which he wiped away with his school jacket's sleeve. We talked softly of nicer things, of the weather, and of nothing at all. Before he left I slipped some coins inside his school jacket, just enough to see him through a few days. We parted with a hug and a chastely kiss. <<set $DavidEvent2 to 1>> <<elseif $DavidEvent1 == 1 and $DavidEvent2 == 1 and $DavidEvent3 == 0>>Once again I journeyed to the most hidden part of the Garden to meet my friend <span style="color:#fc6c85">David</span> and share a blunt. Upon arriving to his usual spot, I found <span style="color:#fc6c85">David</span> happily looking at a fat-looking blunt he'd just rolled. <span style="color:#fc6c85">David</span>: Truly a work of art, eh Sis? Perhaps God has presented me with my true calling: blunt rolling! We both laughed at his casual blasphemy as I admired his work. We sat down and had a pleasant smoke session as we talked through our recent issues. It seemed he was as troubled as ever, an aimless youth. It was not my place to fix it, though. After about an hour, we parted ways with a friendly hug, during which I put some coins in his pockets. <<set $DavidEvent3 to 1>> <<else>>Once again I journeyed to the most hidden part of the Garden to meet my friend <span style="color:#fc6c85">David</span> and share a blunt. There was no doubt in my mind that they were all getting wet at the though of what was about to happen I pulled up my robes, exposing my shapely behind to the warm air. The sacrifice could not help but admire my assets, his hitherto flaccid member becoming slightly excited. I carefully got up on the altar with him, positioning my body on top of his in preparation to give him "the ride of a lifetime". <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Ita ut crescere te magis justum est in potentia, et adorant. I used my hand to bring the sacrifice to full mast, which did not take long. Perhaps he was truly excited by the prospect of being sacrificed to the Dark Lord, or had completely misunderstood the situation. My assistants now twirled in place, shouting I ecstasy as the Prince of Pleasure made His presence known, snuffing out the fires and candles we had lit to welcome him. As I inserted the sacrifice's cock into my wet pussy, I smiled. The least I could do is make sure he enjoyed his last moments. I rode him with glee, making sloppy, wet sounds as I took advantage of his bound form. <center><img src="images/Day 5/Rituals/Fusion Fuck.gif"/></center> <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Fornicati sunt, et per violentiam, liceat mihi FUSIONEM! With the final words of the ritual complete, I drove with all my will to make the man come to completion in time with the reverberating pulsations of the room and the air itself. In the end, the sacrifice could not help but release his seed, and his soul with it, inside of me. I felt his scared, sinful soul momentarily exist within me, before it was devoured by my own, aided by the power of the Great One. <center><img src="images/Day 5/Rituals/Fusion cum.gif"/></center> The subsumation of the sinner's soul was more intense than the most pleasurable of body-shaking orgasms. To put it simply, it felt like a great, ever-increasing pressure on my being, which was then released all at once. It was simply exquisite. I lay on the altar, just enjoying the pure joy of Ascension, my senses on fire. Finally, my assistants approached me, inquiring as to my well-being. My new-found heterochromia, one eye turning a deep, blood-red, and increased height were both good indicators to them that their mistress had succesfully fusioned her soul with that of a black-hearted sinner. The assistants chanted in unison as I stood up, revealing my powerful naked form. My body, an icon of perfection. I was ever closer to the image of Lilith. I wanted to play, I wanted to enjoy the fruits of my hard labour but… Ugh, that fucking parasite. I was fed up with him coming around and exploiting us. You have what you wanted, and now it's just a matter of time for the process to complete.// <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span> wanted to say something else, but the firmness in her <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Father's</span> voice made her aware she shouldn't disobey. //I guess it's just a matter of time now...// she repeated to herself as she tried to go unconscious again. //It's just a matter of time...// <center><img src="images/Day 5/Epilogue/apprentice remake.png" width="500px"></center> <center>''CONGRATULATIONS, YOU’VE FINISHED THE WHORE OF BABYLON'S <span style="color:#ef7f1c">APPRENTICE'S PATH!</span>'' But hey, this is not the end! now that you rule the convent there’s a lot of things you can do, like train your girls and upgrade your facilities (among other things). You can also choose to play some other route where you can be a Purifying Angel, a follower of Helen's Dark Flock, or become a full Demon Queen. It’s up to you! We hope you've enjoyed the game and the story. Be sure to check out Patreon page and social media to know about [[THE DAEDALUS PROJECT|https://www.patreon.com/kittyandthelord?filters[tag]=The%20Daedalus%20Project]], future updates, blogs, art and more!</center> [[⇒ Go back|⇒ Main hallway]] <<set $DemonPower += 10>> <<set $MotherEvent1 to 1>> <<set $HasVengeanceMotherSuperior to 1>> <<set $Money +=10000>>As the pain and suffering was being taken away from me my body started feeling lighter and lighter. The wooden rosary started shining so bright that I thought I was being blinded from it. I didn't feel any fear, the feeling that was coursing through me was pure and soothing, and the peace I felt within me was something I had never felt before. <span style="color:#2996eb">Inner Voice</span>: <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>, we finally meet... <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Who are you? You're not the Rosary, you don't sound like him at all... <span style="color:#2996eb">Inner Voice</span>: You're right, I am no longer tainted by sin and corruption. This is your opus, <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>, you made me like this because your will is strong, like unstained steel, and your soul has demonstrated to be incorruptible. You have washed away all the darkness that has been deposited in me for generations and I thank you for that. Now, in return, I wanted to do something similar and I couldn't ignore the fact that your good actions and sacrifices had made you miserable in this place full of demons and twisted souls. Are you feeling a little bit better? <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: I certainly am, Rosary. I was so shattered a few moments ago, but now I feel... Renovated? Anyways, I still don't understand. I've been used and defiled and my vows have been broken long ago. My flesh has betrayed me in countless occasions and I've fallen into depravity most of the times my peers took advantage of me. I've done horrible things, things that a good servant of God would never do. I don't think I've been keeping up with the teachings our Lord has given to us, neither have I been strong enough to prevent others from falling into the hands of the demon of lust. So despite all of this, how come I've been honored with your visit? <span style="color:#2996eb">Inner Voice</span>: Oh, dear girl. I see you have learned your lessons from your <span style="color:#07d7fc">Mother</span>. You see <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>, the Lord doesn't want you to be perfect or even attempt to be it. Measuring ourselves with impossible standards only brings frustration and pain since you can trap yourself in your own spiral of resentment for not being capable of rising to the challenge. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Boy, this sounds familiar... You mean, she was consumed by her own thirst for discipline and perfection, which made her fall into the abyss. Is that right, Rosary? <span style="color:#2996eb">Inner Voice</span>: You're right. It is a dangerous game to try to become the bastion of perfection. Humans are not made for that. You're made of flesh and you're meant to do the best you can with all your flaws and imperfections. You see, it's not about prohibiting ourselves to do this or that, it is about the intentions and aspirations that abide in your heart and the way you treat your peers. You simply do not do to others what you wouldn't like them to do to you. And I've seen how you treat others, <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>. I know your soul is filled with kindness and piety. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Do you mean it, Rosary? Oh, I don't know what to say, I'm just not used to being told all these things. I really thank you. <span style="color:#2996eb">Inner Voice</span>: Don't thank me, this is all on you. But this doesn't mean you can relax now, dear. There's still a lot of things to work on... <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: What do you mean? <span style="color:#2996eb">Inner Voice</span>: This convents is being ruled by demons and horrible creatures whose intentions are bringing the reign of darkness upon humanity. Your <span style="color:green">Sister</span> and your <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Father</span>... [[My what?]] <<set $BookReveal to 0>> <<set $Book to 0>> <<set $Sin -= 30>><span style="color:#2996eb">Inner Voice</span>: <span style="color:green">Helen</span> and <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Sitri</span>, my dear. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: I'm confused. Who's <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Sitri</span>? Why do you think he's my father? <span style="color:#2996eb">Inner Voice</span>: Oh, you have so much to learn yet... I see you're completely out of touch with the origins of your twisted family. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: This is the first time I hear that name. <span style="color:#2996eb">Inner Voice</span>: You see, I, as a Rosary, have been with your family for generations, <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>. Before <span style="color:#07d7fc">Mother Superior</span>, came her mother, and also her grandmother. <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Martín</span>, as you humans call him, gave me as a present for them so they would carry me around. As a lesser demon, my only job was to absorb all the darkness in their souls in order to grow stronger and control them, make them the ideal Mary Magdalene for him. Once he had his groomed wife, he was supposed to free me in a human body as a reward for my many, many years of service. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: But now you're not a demon, right? The aura of your presence has nothing to do with what it was before. I can tell you're no longer dark and evil. And if you have survived until now, that means he hasn't been succesful yet. <span style="color:#2996eb">Inner Voice</span>: You're right. Each one of his experiments have been successful in some ways but failed in other that were shown to be crucial. The first generation, around a hundred and fifty years ago, proved to be very inflexible. The Superior showed a great appreciation towards her vows and values, she actually believed in them so the most I could do was to absorb the few impure thoughts she had and her unmeasured love for discipline…. Your <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Father</span> loved her, she was strong, beautiful, strict, I think <span style="color:#07d7fc">Mother Superior</span> reminded him of her. But anyways, she was ungovernable, and her soul proved to be pure although she never confronted your <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Father</span> directly. The second generation was very different, actually the opposite of her forebearer: delicate, submissive, always ready to obey him, she found great joy in pleasing him in every way she could. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Well, that seems like just what he wanted. What went wrong? <span style="color:#2996eb">Inner Voice</span>: She didn’t have the necessary strength to continue her path along with <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Sitri</span>. At first he was sure she would be the one and would ascend quickly, but time rapidly showed that her weak will was an obstacle for her to take the initiative of standing in the place she was supposed to have. She passed almost unnoticed everywhere and he began having his doubts about the worth of the girl for the “job”. At last, she lost her mind for him and became completely useless for anything that didn’t involved pleasing him in carnal ways… Ironically, my demonic predecessor was able to gain a very decent amount of power only because of her insatiable lust. [[Jesus, this is a lot to process right now...|Jesus, this is a lot to process right now...]] [[I can't believe I had my family before my eyes all this time...|Jesus, this is a lot to process right now...]]<span style="color:#2996eb">Inner Voice</span>: The third generation, I mean, the <span style="color:#07d7fc">Mother Superior</span> you once knew, at first looked like finally his efforts were bringing results. She was temperate, strict but motherly, hard working, smart, funny, she was the perfect ruler. Your <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Father</span> was amazed. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: That sounds a little bit different from what I remember of her, honestly. What went wrong? <span style="color:#2996eb">Inner Voice</span>: She fell in love with him. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Is that a bad thing? <span style="color:#2996eb">Inner Voice</span>: Love is not a feeling that a demon should have. It represents the opposite of what they want, what they are. <span style="color:#07d7fc">Mother Superior</span> started thinking her love could save <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Sitri</span>, transform him. She was very reticent to follow the church’s values at first, but in her quest to transform him, she started following them strictly although she never actually believed in them. My demonic predecessor was able to feed himself from her contradictions and her love for punishing the youngest ones. She actually convinced herself that she was doing good. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: That's why he chose to do it once again with me? <span style="color:#2996eb">Inner Voice</span>: More or less. Once <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Sitri</span> was convinced her feelings wouldn’t let her ascend, he unmade the spell by which I was bonded to <span style="color:#07d7fc">Mother Superior</span>. But before that he made sure to leave her pregnant, but this baby wasn’t you, <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>. First came Sister <span style="color:green">Helen</span>, my dear. I opened my eyes as wide as they would go. I started remembering every memory I had with <span style="color:green">Helen</span> reinterpreting it with this new information. Did she know this? Was she always mean to me because of this reason? How come I had the Rosary since she was the firstborn? <span style="color:#2996eb">Inner Voice</span>: Let me try to answer you, okay? <span style="color:#07d7fc">Mother Superior</span> adored <span style="color:green">Helen</span> when she was born, a situation which I never saw with any of the previous generations. She took care of her, day and night, almost never slept because she was afraid that <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Sitri</span> would bond me to her or just take her in the middle of the night. Despite that, <span style="color:green">Helen</span> appeared to be evil by nature and everything that <span style="color:#07d7fc">Mother Superior</span> didn’t want her to be, she caused her a lot of suffering until she didn’t know what to do with her anymore. She offered him to take <span style="color:green">Helen</span>, but with the condition that he would give her another child, and that's were you appear, dear girl. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: But that still doesn’t explain why you were bonded to me instead of <span style="color:green">Helen</span>… <span style="color:#d82929">Inner Voice</span>: When you were born, the one who fell in love with you was <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Sitri</span>. Instead, <span style="color:#07d7fc">Mother Superior</span> instantly knew that you, this new child, would just remind her of all her mistakes and that she would never be able to have a <span style="color:green">Helen</span> that would love her back. For some reason, when he tried bonding us, the spell didn’t work, which had never happened before. By analizing you and your behavior we came to the conclusion that you were… too pure to be co-opted. [[Well, the fact that I ended up being caught revealed that maybe I am not that pure...]]<span style="color:#2996eb">Inner Voice</span>: Being too pure doesn’t mean at all that you can’t be under a diabolical influence or that you're always incorruptible. It just means that the person has a very powerful will, which can be used for good or evil. But since you were a baby, there was no chance of you having a corrupt soul. We were sure you would develop your wickedness eventually like your big sister, but unlike her, you were not influenced so, we had to wait until you decided what to do with your power. This made <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Sitri</span> decide to wait until the first opportunity of you being weak and doubtful to bond us. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Wow, I had no idea. All of this... All of this has been happening even before I was born. All these lives ruined and suffering provoked just because he wants even more power... <span style="color:#2996eb">Inner Voice</span>: That's right. This is a battle between forces that have been fighting since the dawn of times, <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Please tell me I can do something about it, Rosary. You didn't tell me all of this just to satisfy my curiosity and make me learn about my past, right? I know there's something I can do. <span style="color:#2996eb">Inner Voice</span>: You're a smart girl, as always. Yes, there's something you can do about it. In fact, you may be the one that ends this for good. You have been able to change me, even though my demonic predecessor had accumulated a decent amount of power throughout generations you had the strength, not only to avoid your soul being corrupted, but to expel all of it and purify my being. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: But I don't know how to do that, Rosary. To be honest, I don't even know what I did for you to become this. <span style="color:#2996eb">Inner Voice</span>: That doesn't matter for now, <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>. Don't you see? You've proven to be able to use your will to transform all the demonic power into goodness and love with me, which means you're going to be able to do so with all the other humans. Don't try to explain it. It is you, you were born with it and you showed it. Now, you just need proper training to develop your powers towards the correct direction. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Are you going to train me, Rosary? <span style="color:#2996eb">Inner Voice</span>: I'm afraid I can't do that, but I can show you the way. There's a book that explains the arts of the black magick, but I haven’t seen it since <span style="color:#07d7fc">Mother Superior</span> was your age. I believe it must be hidden somewhere in this convent, but it’s up to you to find it. When you do, you must purify it to discharge the spells of their darkness and evil, and then it'll show you how to invoke <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Sitri</span>, I mean, <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Father Martín's</span> real form and defeat him. Once you've done everyhting you have to do, you have to find a way to destroy it so no human can ever have acces to it again. I'm sure the Book will tell you how. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Oh, well. That doesn’t sound so hard, then. I’ll find it and I'll put myself to work. <span style="color:#d82929">Inner Voice</span>: One more thing, <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>… <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Yes? <span style="color:#d82929">Inner Voice</span>: Be sure to train your faith and reduce your Sin. If they see you weak, it'll make them stronger. [[Go back|⇒ Your room (P)]] <<set $BookReveal to 1>> <<set $FirstTimeReading to 0>>I held the old book between my hands, studying it closely. It had a sinister glow and just having it before me made me feel weird and kind of freaked out, but I knew it was up to me to purify it and make it work to my advantage. <span style="color:#2996eb">Inner Voice</span>: That's right, <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>. Don't be afraid. Just hold it firmly and focus on transmitting what's inside you to it. I'm sure you're powerful enough. I nodded my head and, although I must admit I had no idea what I was doing, I followed the Rosary's instructions. Goosebumps traveled all over my body as I pulled the object closer and closer. However, I also felt the strange need to press it towards my chest to feel it against me. Thousands of rippling voices invaded my head, screaming and threatening me to stop inmediately what I was doing, but their intents of discouragement only served to make me feel more determined in following the righteous path. For the first time I had no doubt of what my purpose was. I gathered all my strength to keep focusing on my task, and it seemed like it was working. The voices started fading away and the poisonous aura began disappearing. In a matter of minutes it all went away, including all my fears, uncertainties and resentments. It was like if I had all the answers now. I felt renewed, and when I looked at the book, it appeared to be the same for it. <center><img src="images/Inventory/Book celestial.png"></center><<set $FirstTimeReading to 1>> <span style="color:#2996eb">Inner Voice</span>: Nicely done! You've been able to purify it and now its magic will serve your purposes. Once you're done using it the book must be destroyed, <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>. You shall end this madness once and for all and protect your sisters from the divine world's matters. We can't assure no other demon will find it and use it to his advantage. ''WARNING: There's no going back'' [[PERFORM THE RITUAL|Salvation]] [[Go back|Read the book (P)]]Description: This ritual will allow you to purify a soul that's been corrupted by the deadly sin of Envy. src="images/Inventory/wine.jpg"></div><<else>><div style="float: right"><img src="images/Inventory/unknown.png"></div><</if>><center><img src="images/Day 5/Rituals/Ascenscion preparation.gif"/></center> As I read the description of the spell I inmediately knew which soul corrupted by this particular sin needed to be purified. I didn't know much about <span style="color:#8B4513">Papa Slick's</span> life or past, but I knew he was a heartless man when it came to exploiting his workers. I've beared his cruel punishments and endured his harmful words, and it was up to me to never let that happen again to another poor girl in that horrible place. As the book adviced, I had to teach <span style="color:#8B4513">Papa Slick</span> not to let avarice overcome his own humanity. For this I thought it would be a good idea to give him a little bit of his own medicine, not like a punishment, but in a way he felt at least a little bit of empathy for the women he employed. I lighted the candles and incense, spread the salt, burnt the laurel and recited the latin prayers along with <span style="color:#a82855">Silvia</span> as we drank the wine. For the last step, I cut the palm of my hand with the sword and offered my blood to the Lord as a symbol of my devotion for his cause. I promised that the only suffering from now on would be only mine in order to protect ant teach those whose hearts had fallen into sin and couldn't see the light as I did. <span style="color:#a82855">Silvia</span> cleaned the trail of my blood and treated my wound. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: It's time to go, Sister. We need to head to that infamous place, our prayers must be starting to take effect. She nodded her head with a smile and followed me to the brothel. [[Go to the Brothel]] <<set $NumberOfCandles -= 10>> <<set $NumberOfWine -= 4>><<set $NumberOfIncense -= 2>> <<set $NumberOfLaurel -= 8>><<set $Energy -= 2>><center><img src="images/Day 5/Rituals/Ascenscion preparation.gif"/></center> <span style="color:#a82855">Silvia</span>: A nun? What does this mean? You and I are nuns, do we count? She asked as we were preparing the scenario. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Well, I'm guessing it should be a nun corrupted by the deadly sin of envy. <span style="color:#a82855">Silvia</span>: That is very specific... Maybe the book is implying one of us is envious? <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: I don't know... I mean, I've always thought that I would like to be like you. You're so smart, kind and patient. Its hard for me to think that you were still by my side helping and guiding me when I felt regretful after sinning again and again. But I would't say that I envy you as it is written in the book. I rather think that I admire you, I think that's the word. <span style="color:#a82855">Silvia</span>: Those are some beautiful words, Sister. Let's not overthink it and lets try to make the spell. We'll see how it goes. She smiled and grabed my hands to recite together the ancient verses written in those old pages. To be honest, I wasn't feeling anything different. I was expecting something like when the Rosary was purified which filled my soul with beautiful sensations. <span style="color:#a82855">Silvia</span>: How are you? <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: I don't think this is working... I don't feel anything at all. <span style="color:#a82855">Silvia</span>: Yeah, me neither. Even when we did the spell for the pimp I was feeling like... I don't know. Something. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Maybe neither of our souls are stained with envy. Maybe we should try some other nun? <span style="color:#a82855">Silvia</span>: Who would you suggest? I stopped to think for a moment which of my sisters could be the one whose profile fitted the recquirements of the spell. [[Perhaps María?]] <<set $NumberOfCandles -= 8>> <<set $NumberOfWine -= 3>><<set $NumberOfIncense -= 3>> <<set $NumberOfLaurel -= 2>><<set $NumberOfCherry -= 3>><<set $Energy -= 2>> <span style=“color:#ce5cc8”>$name</span>: Spell of wrath... Do you know someone that fits with this sin? I must say I'm out of options. <span style=“color:green”>Helen</span>: What about that girl of yours? <span style="color:#fc6c85">Dalia</span>? She's the only one I can think of. <span style=“color:#ce5cc8”>$name</span>: I don't think so. She's very sweet and well-manered. And above all, she's very patient. She will endure everything as long as she gets what she wants. <span style=“color:green”>Helen</span>: And what if she doesn't get it? In that case, do you see her bursting in flames? <span style=“color:#ce5cc8”>$name</span>: When I'm with her I can see her aura. She's not that kind of person. I know her well. Sometimes I wish I had her temper, to be honest. <span style=“color:green”>Helen</span>: That sounds like a clear clue to me, <span style=“color:#ce5cc8”>$name</span>... <span style=“color:#ce5cc8”>$name</span>: Are you saying I'm the subject of the spell? Do you think I'm tainted by the deadly sin of wrath? <span style=“color:green”>Helen</span>: I don't know, <span style=“color:#ce5cc8”>$name</span>. Have you forgiven <span style="color:#07d7fc">Mother</span> for her mistakes? Are you truly convinced that you can fight <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Father</span> without falling into his mind games? Are you sure you have erased from your heart every trace of resentment you have for me? Can you look at the girls right in the eye and be sure you don't want or need any kind of revenge or payment for the way they humiliated you day after day? My inmediate impulse was to answer "Yes", but something stopped me from doing so. <span style=“color:green”>Helen</span> really sinked her finger into the sore this time. Of course my conscious self was convinced that I was okay with everything, but it was better to be safe than sorry and it occurred to me that perhaps I still needed to clean my soul a little bit before reaching the finish line. After all, I really didn't feel the way she described. She immediately sensed the doubt in my expression <span style=“color:green”>Helen</span>: It can take months, even years to succesfully heal a wound that some else provoked, even more if you really trusted them... I felt a lump in my throat. <span style=“color:green”>Helen</span> was right and I was amazed by her wisdom. Once again her cleverness made clear why she was the big sister. I sat by her side and she conforted me as a couple of tears ran down my cheeks. She wiped them and kissed me. <span style=“color:green”>Helen</span>: I know you can do it, <span style=“color:#ce5cc8”>$name</span>. You've come so far. I'm sure this spell will help you accelerate the process. <span style=“color:#ce5cc8”>$name</span>: I'm afraid of this spell, <span style=“color:green”>Helen</span>. You've seen it. If I don't pass all four tests this will mean the work we've done, all the path we've walked will be for nothing. It's too much pressure, I don't... //Shhhh...// she carressed my lips and hugged me. I closed my eyes and focused on her hearbeat. That gave me a little bit of the strenght I was looking for. //[[I think I'm ready now...|Seduction test]]// <<set $NumberOfCandles -= 4>><<set $NumberOfCherry -= 2>><<set $NumberOfWine -= 2>><<set $Energy -= 3>><span style="color:#bbf230">María</span> was the next sister on my list. From what I knew she had one of the kindest hearts here at the convent, otherwise, I couldn’t explain to myself why would she had helped me during the times where I needed her the most, that being all the days and nights <span style="color:green">Helen</span> punished me without food. In spite of this, I had to purify her since it appears she wasn’t as pure as I thought. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: <span style="color:green">Helen</span>, do you think <span style="color:#bbf230">María</span> is a sinner? I always thought you messed with her only because you enjoyed it. She doesn’t seem bad at all. <span style="color:green">Helen</span>: Well, I wouldn’t say she’s bad per se. Remember those times where the food and flour was scarce for a while? <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Yes, that was because <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Father</span> would steal from the Convent’s account for his own pockets. Which reminds me that you should’ve known that for a while… Did you? <span style="color:green">Helen</span>: Yes, I did. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Were you profiting from what he stole? <span style="color:green">Helen</span>: At first I did, but then I realized that his antics where actually harming the sisters. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: I thought you didn’t even care. <span style="color:green">Helen</span>: Some nights <span style="color:#ffbb99">Adele</span> would come to my room begging for bread. Most of the days she hadn’t even had breakfast. <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Father</span> used to say that in order to grow powerful and fulfill my destiny as a Demon Queen I had to “toughen up” and get rid of my human heart. I was told I had to do horrible things to achieve my goal… Her voice broke a little bit and she had to stop talking. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Oh, Sister… I’m so sorry, that’s monstrous. <span style="color:green">Helen</span>: Anyways, some days I just couldn’t handle it and kept to myself some bread and cheese to feed her, but every time he noticed, he would whip me as hard as he could and lecture me about how demons couldn’t show mercy or such things at all. He would torment me by saying that if I couldn’t do it, he would find somebody else and get rid of me. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: That man is horrible. <span style="color:green">Helen</span>: He’s not a man, <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>. He’s a fucking demon and I can’t wait to see him dead. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: We will take care of him soon, but for now we have to focus on purifying everything we can. If not, he will feed from the darkness and it’ll be more difficult. Anyways, what does this have to do with <span style="color:#bbf230">María</span>? <span style="color:green">Helen</span>: I found <span style="color:#bbf230">María</span> stealing bread every day. She knew that there was almost none for the sisters so she found a way to keep a good amount to herself and be quiet about it. That’s why I took over her key, so she wouldn’t go to the pantry herself. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: I had no idea… I almost feel bad for her, she fed me when I needed it. <span style="color:green">Helen</span>: I know she’s not a bad person. It shouldn’t be hard to purify her. We have no time to lose. [[Go to the kitchen]] <<set $NumberOfCandles -= 3>><<set $NumberOfIncense -= 2>> <<set $NumberOfLaurel -= 2>><<set $Energy -= 2>><span style="color:green">Helen</span> and I walked towards the Chapel. I feared maybe it was going to be full of people again and we wouldn’t be able to get to them, but then I figured that with <span style="color:green">Helen</span> by my side, they wouldn’t try anything. They just wouldn’t attack their Superior as easily as they would do with me and <span style="color:#a82855">Silvia</span>. Oh, dear <span style="color:#a82855">Silvia</span>, you were right. <span style="color:green">Helen</span> was the one I had to finish this journey with. Once we were there we only saw sisters moving chairs and putting everything back in its place. It looked like they just had finished one of their Disgrace Shows, but the ambience didn’t seem as relaxed as always. We examined the place, but there were no signs of <span style="color:#ff9999">Grace</span> or <span style="color:#ffff00">Aitana</span>. <span style="color:green">Helen</span> decided to call for them out loud. Her voice was as strong and firm as always. It was like the purification process changed her heart, but not her essence. All the sisters stood quietly, looking at each other with a nervous look on their faces. <span style="color:green">Helen</span>: Where in the name of The Lord are those two girls? I need to see them right away. After a moment of silence, <span style="color:#cc99ff">Sonia</span> took a step forward and with a shy, scared voice, tried to say something. <span style="color:#cc99ff">Sonia</span>: Mistress <span style="color:green">Helen</span>, they uh… They will be back soon, they… <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: Its okay, <span style="color:#cc99ff">Sonia</span>. You can talk to us. We aren’t here to punish anybody. We just want to know where they are. Can you tell us that? After I spoke, she relaxed her shoulders knowing that <span style="color:green">Helen</span> was not a threat. It was obvious people were still scared of her since only I knew what was going on with her. Despite that, <span style="color:#cc99ff">Sonia's</span> expression also reflected surprise because of the unexpected new alliance between me and <span style="color:green">Helen</span>. <span style="color:#cc99ff">Sonia</span>: Yes. Sure, I can do that. It’s just that… Something happened. Something… //bad// happened -she lowered her gaze. <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span>: You can tell us. There’s nothing to be afraid of. <span style="color:#cc99ff">Sonia</span>: <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Father Martín</span> was here earlier. He attended the last show and demanded <span style="color:#ff9999">Grace</span> and <span style="color:#ffff00">Aitana</span> to bring <span style="color:#ffbb99">Adele</span> to serve him. Of course they hesitated, but… That man, he gives me the creeps, I swear. In the end they agreed and brought her. She didn’t want to, but had no other choice. We don’t know exactly what happened, but when we found <span style="color:#ffbb99">Adele</span> she was wounded. There was blood all over the floor and she was barely conscious. She couldn’t even talk or focus her sight, it was like she was really drunk or high or something. It was terrible to see her like that. I looked at <span style="color:green">Helen</span> and noticed how her expression instantly broke. Her lips tensed and her eyes were clouded by tears. Suddenly, she wasn’t wearing the mask anymore. She was human, like all of us here. All the sisters that were there couldn’t hold their expressions of confusion after noticing that. <span style="color:green">Helen</span>: Where is she, <span style="color:#cc99ff">Sonia</span>? I need to see her now. Is she okay? <span style="color:#cc99ff">Sonia</span>: <span style="color:#ff9999">Grace</span> and <span style="color:#ffff00">Aitana</span> took her to the vestry and lay her down, I belie- She couldn’t even finish the sentence and <span style="color:green">Helen</span> was already running to where she was. I followed her to see the state <span style="color:#ffbb99">Adele</span> was in. I felt really bad for <span style="color:green">Helen</span> since I knew how close she was to <span style="color:#ffbb99">Adele</span>. I also couldn’t believe how <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Father Martín</span>, no, that demon could do something so cruel. Involving an innocent girl that had nothing to do with this confrontation… [[Enter the vestry]] <<set $NumberOfCandles -= 3>><<set $NumberOfIncense -= 2>> <<set $NumberOfLaurel -= 2>><<set $NumberOfCherry -= 1>><<set $Energy -= 3>>As <span style="color:green">Helen</span> and I walked together towards the Confessionary we talked about <span style="color:#669999">Naomi</span>. Of all the sisters I knew she would probably be the one who had the best chance to confront <span style="color:green">Helen</span>. <span style="color:#669999">Naomi</span> also had a tough nature and knew exactly what she wanted, and if somebody got in her way she would just go ahead and charge without hesitation. In her eyes, she was the smartest in the convent, and also the most respectable only after <span style="color:green">Helen</span>, and only then because she was her superior. I’m pretty sure she also thought she was the most beautiful, just to complete the Holy Trinity. When we got to the confessionary, we saw a line of men standing on one side of it. They were dressed in long, brown habits and looked impatient. On the other side was <span style="color:#669999">Naomi</span>, who also looked impatient and kept staring at her watch nervously. When she saw us arrive, she came towards <span style="color:green">Helen</span>, greeting her with an anxious smile. <span style="color:#669999">Naomi</span>: Oh, <span style="color:green">Helen</span>… I mean, Mistress <span style="color:green">Helen</span>, I didn’t know you were going to come by. <span style="color:green">Helen</span>: Hey, <span style="color:#669999">Naomi</span>. Who are these men? Are they waiting to get serviced? <span style="color:#669999">Naomi</span>: Yes, well… You see, Evelyn should be here, but I don’t know where the heck this girl is! Hey, now that <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span> is here, why don’t we use her? Her turn was meant in a few days but it should be okay… <span style="color:#669999">Naomi</span> was about to drag me by the hand, but <span style="color:green">Helen</span> put her arm between us to forbid her to take me. Naomi looked at her surprised. <span style="color:green">Helen</span>: Sister <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span> is with me now. She won’t be doing this anymore. Answer me, who are these guys? <span style="color:#669999">Naomi</span>: They’re <span style="color:#ef7f1c">Father Martín's</span> new altar boys. He promised them a girl for today before their initiation tomorrow. <span style="color:green">Helen</span>: And there’s no girl, apparently. What are you going to do, <span style="color:#669999">Naomi</span>? I say you should put your pride aside and satisfy the client. Otherwise, how are you going to be a professional businesswoman? <span style="color:green">Helen</span> glanced at me and winked her eye. It looks like she had a plan and everything under control. Oh, how I admired my big sister. <span style="color:#669999">Naomi</span> looked at <span style="color:green">Helen</span>, her face showing confusion and irritation. I knew how much she liked to be in a position of power, but this time, she was going to be the one servicing. I sensed her intentions to try to fight back, but she didn’t say anything. She just stood there, hesitant. <span style="color:green">Helen</span>: I will give you a couple of minutes to prepare yourself, meanwhile, I’ll distract the altar boys and have them prepare a nice and comfortable scenario. Sister <span style="color:#ce5cc8">$name</span> will help you get prepared, okay? [[Calm Naomi down and help her get ready]] <<set $NumberOfCandles -= 3>><<set $NumberOfIncense -= 2>> <<set $NumberOfLaurel -= 2>><<set $NumberOfCherry -= 1>><<set $Energy -= 3>><center><img src="images/Day 5/Rituals/Praying nun.jpg"/></center> I must say I stood for a while with the Book in my hands, reading time and time again the warning that was written on the previous page. Figuring out whether I wanted to proceed with the final spell or maybe just indulge myself with a little bit more of the beautiful earthly life we had accomplished together in our convent. It was like each and every one of us had found their place in the world and in our home. We brought up the convent from its ruins since Father was here no more to steal from us and our work. Day after day the ovens were working at maximum capacity and our bread was sold out within the first couple of hours every day at the local market. We also had invested in renewing the facilities of the convent; it was so clean and stunning every single girl was delighted to be a part of our commune. Everyone worked hard but also had their fair share of free time, which we liked to spend doing study and debate clubs, cooking delicious new meals for everyone almost every day, holding sports tournaments outdoors in our precious garden, we had even built a swimming pool! Life was just so perfect. I would've never dreamt about anything like this, and yet, I was fully conscious that I had been involved in its creation. My life here was like a dream that I didn't want to wake up from. I thought once again about my girls... <<linkappend "Helen" t8n>>, my dear big sister. Since she announced her retirement as Superior and named me instead, she had been my loyal second. It was amazing how all the energy she had put before into making others miserable was now directed towards helping them. Her relationship with Adele flourished stronger and more pure since Helen had put behind her her thirst for power. She supervised that everyday the chores of the convent had been done, and she was also in charge of welcoming and touring the new girls. Most of the local school girls are now dreaming of becoming a nun, and she guides them towards the path of love and devotion.<</linkappend>> <<linkappend "Silvia" t8n>>, the dearest of my friends.
